name: Mejuri Inc.
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to sell handcrafted fine jewelry for everyday use. The company's direct-to-consumer e-commerce platform features products such as rings, pendants, earrings, bracelets, and other luxury jewelry made up of precious and semi-precious stones, enabling women to buy handcrafted accessories online.
